description: This file defines the interface for the WAN Manager IPC (Inter-Process Communication) in the RDK software. It contains include guards, includes necessary headers, declares functions for sending messages to IHC (if FEATURE_IPOE_HEALTH_CHECK is enabled), starting the IPC server, and forcing DHCPv6 renewal.

methods.name: WanMgr_SendMsgToIHC
methods.description: Sends a message to the IHC component, conditional on FEATURE_IPOE_HEALTH_CHECK.

methods.name: WanMgr_StartIpcServer
methods.description: Starts the IPC server to handle WAN Manager clients.

methods.name: Wan_ForceRenewDhcpIPv6
methods.description: Forces a DHCPv6 renewal on the specified interface.
